professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in DB2, SQL, and UNIX/Linux systems. Skilled in database administration, performance tuning, high availability configurations, and data warehouse operations.

key_responsibilities: Administered DB2 databases on AIX and Windows platforms.
Configured high availability solutions using HADR.
Performed security architecture reviews and SQL tuning.
Monitored and optimized database performance using tools like Quest Central and Spotlight.
Installed and upgraded DB2 clients on servers and workstations.
Configured ODBC data sources for client access.
Migrated multi-terabyte databases to current versions of DB2.
Performed regular maintenance activities such as REORG and RUNSTATS.
Improved database performance by implementing table partitioning and DPF.
